GenericMemHdr Struct Reference

#include <GenericPlatform.h>

unsigned int size

unsigned int eyecatcher

Detailed Description

A "header" that gets put ahead of stuff we allocate. This allows auditing memory allocation and also allows Purify to work, because it's the same layout as ObjectHeader (in MemoryManagement.h). So, if ObjectHeader changes, this will need to change also (you'll get a run-time error from GenerCMPlatform_MemoryAllocateWithHdr()).

Field Documentation

void(* GenericMemHdr::Destructor_unused)(IPDR_PlatformServices *PS, void *)
 

unsigned int GenericMemHdr::eyecatcher
 

"signature" for debugging: gets set to "a0a1a2a3" for validating pointers to GenericMemHdr (set to something else when memory is freed): see same field in ObjectHeader

int GenericMemHdr::ReferenceCount_unused
 

match ObjectHeader in MemoryManagement.h

unsigned int GenericMemHdr::size
 

MUST be first to match layout of ObjectHeader in MemoryManagement.h
